DOC.brief_summary: This trial is to investigate the effect on next-day driving performance and psychomotor performance in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Effect of Single and Multiple Doses Org 50081 and a Single Dose of Zopiclone on Next-day Driving Ability and Psychomotor Performance in Healthy Volunteers. (P05794) (COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Subject has at least 3 years of car driving experience Subject signs the trial Informed Consent Form Subject is in a healthy condition as judged by the investigator Subject has a regular sleep pattern Subject has insomnia or any other sleep disorder Medication or drug use of any kind prior to the study Relevant history or presence of a significant medical illness
